https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/cnFGxgojtNpi1cavNRNldfzvCk7.jpg When the body of the executive of hockey Benoit Brisset is found on the billboard of the border of Quebec and Ontario, the jurisdiction of the crime is shared between the two police forces and detectives David Bouchard from Montreal and Martin Ward from Toronto are assigned to work together. With totally different styles, attitudes and languages. Bon Cop Bad Cop
